channel.title: Havavision Productionz podcast
channel.description:
An eargasm of a podcast giving you the best of London's musical talent. Showcasing HAVAVISION Productionz' Project xXx, HEIDI, Dreadlox Holmes, Jelena, Zein Simone, Siren Filter, Kid Afrika, Lwena and many more artists weekly.
Tune in with our Havavision hosts Dreadlox Holmes & Sexotique!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Feast on some gourmet for the soul!
channel.itunes:author: Havavision Productionz
channel.itunes:summary:
An eargasm of a podcast giving you the best of London's musical talent. Showcasing HAVAVISION Productionz' Project xXx, HEIDI, Dreadlox Holmes, Jelena, Zein Simone, Siren Filter, Kid Afrika, Lwena and many more artists weekly.
Tune in with our Havavision hosts Dreadlox Holmes & Sexotique!

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 10 (Electro, Acoustic, Pop, Soul, Siren Filter Album Taster Special).
item.description: Thanx for all you who have stayed with us this Long, i hope that our quality is prevailing, this week we're playing you some Electro, Acoustic, Pop, Soul, featuring great artists who work with Havavision Productionz, we're also giving you a little taster of What Siren Filter is gonna be coming back at you with. here is this weeks line up and Track Listing. 1. Room Down The Hall (Siren Filter) 2. Fix (Gaia Leigh) 3. Late On Time (Siren Filter) 4. Til It's Done (Heidi featuring Kid Afrika) 5. The Change (Zein Simone) 6. Paradice (Michelle Haynes) 7. Dirty Sunday/Give Myself 2 U (Phatjak,Dimi Phaze, Heidi, Dreadlox Holmes. Peace Love and Positivity, forgive those who are Negative Towards you, but Keep them out of your Lives. Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 9 (End of Summer Jam, Latin, Asian, European Extravaganzza).
item.description:
This is our end of Summer Jam, and what a lovely day it is, Sorry folks i'm a few hours late, OK More than a Few, This week features our Latin, Asian, European Crew, we're always trying to work with all people from all cultures, thats what makes us Unique. I hope you all enjoy this podcast and if you do, don't be shy about leaving encouraging messages on our pages, no we're not interested in any criticism because we're doing the best that we can do, any whatever you say is not gonna change anything, this Podcast is about the music. todays track listing goes like this.
1. W-Wicked Party (Dreadlox Holmes featuring Kid Afrika) 2. Edge Of Your Feet (Heidi) 3. Worse (Andrea Wilde) 4. Ako Nastavis Ovako (Dino Merlin) 5. Desire (Lwena featuring Heidi) 6. U Say I Say ( Dreadlox HolmesFeaturing De Whole A We Posse) 7. Todas Las Mamis Dicen (Dreadlox Holmes Featuring Kid Afrika and Sexotique.
I hope you all had a great summer, and for those who've just finished winter i hope it was warm. Peace love and respects to you all, and may your winters be warm and summers filled with love and Happiness Steve Aka Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 8 (Happy to be alive to make another Pod).
item.description: Hello Lovely People of the world, This is whats on todays menu for all of you 1. God Only Knows (Siren Filter) 2. Tell The Truth (Yana Nywella) 3. You Take Me There (Heidi Featuring Audio Lounge) 4. Hey (Kameko) 5. Good Hurt (Zein Simone Featuring Dreadlox Holmes Remix) 6. Strange Grace (Mineola Featuring Dreadlox Holmes) 7. Come and Get My Love (Dreadlox Holmes featuring Ching on Vocals and Violin. Thanx so much for supporting Havavision Productionz, From Next week Your gonna get to hear, Songs from the Forth Coming "Siren Filter" Album. Now isn't that something to look Forward to? Yes it Is. Peace Love and respects to all of you. Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 7 (Testosterone Free, for the Ladies By the Ladies)
item.description: Hello Lovely People, Today Yours truley Dreadlox Holmes brings you another Podcast (Completely Testosterone Free)Livicated to the Ladies it features Wonderful Women Singing about their experiences and emotions, and because i love women so much, i'm so happy to be promoting them. here is todays exiting track listing 1. Love ( Heidi) 2. Not So Strong (Zein Simone) 3. Give It All Away ( Natascha Sohl) 4. Some Other Word (Andrea Wild) 5. Wouldn't Matter (Anna Eldridge) 6. Higher Than Love (Jelena Kovacevic) 7. Lost In You (Mishelle Bradford Jones) I give you This Music From My Heart with lots of love and cool and positive vibes, Peace and love. Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 6 (A low Key Affair)
item.description: This is a Low key Affair today, folks, so to fit my Mood i'm playing some Slower tracks, There is Also an Exclusive track from Siren Filter's forth coming Album, a brand new track called "Steve McQueen" Today's Track Listing. 1. Wasn't 4 U. (Zein Simone, featuring Dreadlox Holmes) 2. Steve McQueen (Siren Filter) 3. Til It's Done(Heidi featuring Kid Afrika) 4. Last Prayer( Jelena Kovacevic 5. Tears 4 U Evadne (Dreadlox Holmes) 6. Mother (Heidi) 7. Pornstars (Project xXx featuring Andrew Roachford) Please leave your comments, your feedback is truley Welcome. Steve Aka Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 5 Carnival Episode
item.description: This Is the Notting Hill Carnival 2006 Edition of the Havavision Productionz Podcast, Featuring Mostly Dreadlox Holmes and Songs from his "Elementary My Dearest Peeps" Album featuring Heidi, We-Topya, Nyanjah, London Rose, De Whole A We Posse, Manic, Adole, this podcast catches Dreadlox Holmes in an Upbeat Party mood as the carnival Approaches, Check it out Respects Dreadlox Holmes This Weeks Playlist. 1. Wanna Love Ya, Dreadlox Holmes Featuring Heidi and We-Topya 2. Bounce, Nyanjah 3. High Text, Dreadlox Holmes featuring We-Tpoya 5. My Name is Ching, Dreadlox Holmes Featuring Ching 6. Sick to The Bone, Dreadlox Holmes, Featuring London Rose 7. I'll Be Fine, Heidi featuring Dreadlox Holmes 8. No Mess Wid, Dreadlox Holmes, featuring De Whole A We Posse, Nyanjah, Manic, and Adole

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 4 London & The World
item.description:
Yes people keep supporting Havavision Productionz there is no other production Company in the world as Diverse as us, and Certainly not in the UK. Please Proove me Wrong, i'll buy you a Mango Juice, if i'm wrong the line up tonight is wicked, The usual Suspects, Projects Heidi Zein Simone, Plus the others exclusives that you'll Love.
Here's what you're set to hear this week: 1. CRAZY 4 YOUR LOVE with Steve F. Sweet featuring Kameko 2. WHO I BE with our sweet Australian, Heidi 3. ALONE with our beautiful Jelena Kovacevic 4. BEHIND CLOSED DOORS with the unique style of Zein Simone 5. BASTARD with London's crazy Project xXx 6. 5 MILLION STRONG with Dreadlox Holmes and the 1824 Collective (Featuring Lian Hart, L.Man, Lavish, JXXX, Corrisse, Baby Chan, Haze, LST, J2K, Ash, Anushka, Baraka, Alex Holland, Randy J. Cox, Heidi, Zein Simone, Project xXx) and 7. CHILDREN OF THE WORLD with Alf
Keep your shoutouts, comments and requests coming each week!
Peace Love and Respects everytime Dreadlox Holmes

item.title: Havavision Productionz Episode 2 (With guest, Kid Afrika)
item.description: Welcome back for our second episode of our Havavision Productionz podcast! This week your hosts Dreadlox Holmes & Sexotique are bringing you a special guest, Cuban Latin hip hop and reggaeton artist, KID AFRIKA! We've got loads more great music instore for you as well with great variety On today's episode we've got plenty of great music comin' your way. DREADLOX HOLMES & BARAKA with 'Get Up' first up TWEE LAM in her true urban rock chick style with 'Vice (Xfile remix)' ZEIN SIMONE with her beautiful ballad 'Again' KID AFRIKA featuring SEXOTIQUE and DREADLOX HOLMES with the very appropriate 'Summertime' LWENA with 'Desire' PROJECT xXx with mellower sounds 'Subject 2 Change' & HEIDI with 'Come My Angel (Mr Magic Remix)' ALL MUSIC AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE. CHECK LINKS ON THE RIGHT Leave us a comment, say Hi! We'd love to hear from you and we'll give your shout outs live on the following episodes! Let us feed your soul & move your feet. Click on the green arrow below on the left to start this week's episode.

ALL MUSIC AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE. CHECK LINKS ON THE RIGHT
Leave us a comment, say Hi! We'd love to hear from you and we'll give your shout outs live on the following episodes! Let us feed your soul & move your feet.
Click on the green arrow below on the left to start this week's episode.

item.title: Havavision Productionz Launch, our first ever podcast!
item.description: Welcome! You're joining us on our first ever Havavision Productionz podcast. We've got loads instore for you, great music, two hosts, Dreadlox Holmes & Sexotique, great variety, interviews, MP3 giveaways and more!! On today's episode we've got plenty of great music comin' your way. HEIDI first up with her beautiful ballad 'Sadness' DREADLOX HOLMES (featuring NUWELLA) with Boy/Girlfriend a popular hit PROJECT xXx with Calipornia, wild sexy track! DREADLOX HOLMES (featuring DE WHOLE A WE POSSE) with U Say I Say, wicked ragga hip hop ZEIN SIMONE with The Change, in her beautiful melancholic vibes SIREN FILTER with Little Rich Freak, our London writing duo & DREADLOX HOLMES (featuring Sin999) with Seduction....get ready to be seduced! Come join us every week and let us feed your soul & move your feet. Leave us a comment, say Hi! We'd love to hear from you and we'll give your shout outs live on the following episodes! Click on the green arrow below on the left to start this week's episode.
